text: Reginald Abbott (born February 4, 1930) is a Canadian retired professional ice hockey player who played in the National Hockey League (NHL). == Playing career == Reg Abbott played only three games in the NHL in 1952–53 for the Montreal Canadiens. During those three games, he did not score any points nor did he earn any penalty minutes.
